definition: Time makes the man (idiom). The trend of events brings forth the hero.
surname Shi
old variant of 時|时[shi2]
o'clock/time/when/hour/season/period
power/influence/potential/momentum/tendency/trend/situation/conditions/outward appearance/sign/gesture/male genitals
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
hero/outstanding/excellent/(literary) flower/blossom
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence

sentences.english: Someone once said that the circumstances create heroes.

definition: current situation/circumstances/current trend
born at the wrong time (idiom); unlucky (esp. to complain about one's fate)/born under an unlucky star/ahead of his time
a fine bird chooses a tree to nest in (proverb)/fig. a talented person chooses a patron of integrity
pinyin: liang2 qin2 ze2 mu4 er2 qi1

definition: the river flows thirty years to the East, thirty years to the West (proverb)/change is the only constant
pinyin: san1 shi2 nian2 he2 dong1 , san1 shi2 nian2 he2 xi1
related.word: 三十年河东，三十年河西

definition: lit. raised up by Xiao He, cast down by Xiao He (idiom), alluding to Han Xin 韓信|韩信[Han2 Xin4] being made Grand General 大將軍|大将军[da4 jiang1 jun1]/fig. a situation where one's success and failure are both due to the same factor
pinyin: cheng2 ye3 Xiao1 He2 , bai4 ye3 Xiao1 He2

definition: the world in chaos/troubled times/(in Buddhism) the mortal world
see 成則為王，敗則為寇|成则为王，败则为寇[cheng2 ze2 wei2 wang2 , bai4 ze2 wei2 kou4]
lit. that which is long divided must unify, and that which is long unified must divide (idiom, from 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4])/fig. things are constantly changing
pinyin: fen1 jiu3 bi4 he2 , he2 jiu3 bi4 fen1

definition: opportunity/favorable circumstance/stroke of luck
fate of the nation
to judge the hour and size up the situation/to take stock
Easy to raise an army of one thousand, but hard to find a good general. (idiom)
pinyin: qian1 jun1 yi4 de2 , yi1 jiang4 nan2 qiu2

definition: to stand tall and see far (idiom); taking the long and broad view/acute foresight
lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
to come forth in large numbers
planning is with man, accomplishing with heaven (idiom); Man proposes but God disposes.
